name: A collaborative CGT policy
tagline: What the plan to exempt investors in startups CGT may look like
body:
### Let's create a policy that helps startups. 
There is [a discussion](http://www.theage.com.au/comment/newly-energised-liberal-mps-are-exploring-fresh-solutions-to-difficult-problems-20151008-gk46bk.html) happening around whether investments in startups should be tax exempt. Steve Baxter [put some basic numbers together](https://www.facebook.com/RiverCityLabs/posts/1099337146751124), and asked for some help. This repo was created in response.

### Contact
Have questions? Email me at jamespetersonau@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
